alert.note: Alert for Moses Lake Area; Spokane Area; Upper Columbia Basin (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 30 at 3:00AM PST until January 30 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Areas with visibility down to 1/4 mile or lower in dense fog. * WHERE...Othello, Coeur d`Alene, Ritzville, Fairfield, Downtown Spokane, Airway Heights, Post Falls, Coulee City, Ephrata, Rockford, Worley, Grand Coulee, Wilbur, Quincy, Hayden, Davenport, Spokane Valley, Harrington, Moses Lake, Cheney, Odessa, and Creston. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Regional cameras are showing varying conditions across the region. Fog will continue to fill across areas not experiencing fog at this time. Drivers should be prepared for sudden restrictions in visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Moses Lake Area; Spokane Area; Upper Columbia Basin
